author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Porting of local https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1020

This PR drops the simulation of old tau, jet, and MET objects from the sequence and from the event content. It also removes those old modules that are no longer needed from the codebase.
title: [L1T] phase-2, Drop old tau-jet-MET simulation from L1 emulator sequence and event content and remove old modules
